subject: Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Indian Tale, trained by Richard Dutrow Jr., was put on the steward’s list after failing to finish a race at Saratoga on Aug. 18.
snippet: Indian Tale, trained by Richard Dutrow Jr., was put on the steward’s list after failing to finish a race at Saratoga on Aug. 18.
